dct_title_s: TYPUS ASPECTUUM, OPPOSITIONUM ET CON IUNCTIONUM ETZ IN PLANETIS
dct_description_sm: Without imprint. Issued in: Atlas coelestis; seu harmonia macrocosmica (Celestial atlas of universal harmony). -- Amstelodami : apud Joannem Janssonium, 1660, 1661.

[1708], imprint added within right title cartouche: Prostant Amstelodami apud Petrum Schenk et Gerardum Valk C.P. '15' (bottom right) Issued in his Atlas Coelestis ... , published by Gerardum Valk & Petrum Schenk, 1708.

Copperplate engraved. Shows circular ring of zodiac symbols with lines connecting each to others. At center is map of northern hemisphere, including California as an island with rounded northern coastline. Diagram at bottom left entitled "Parallaxes planetarvm" and another at bottom right entitled "Onivnctiones planetarvm". Title divided between 2 cartouches of winged figures holding draped cloth (top left and right). Engraved by: I. van Loon F. (bottom center).
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
